body.p: The first issue of the Gentoo Weekly Newsletter for the New Year brings updates about improvements to Portage, including reverse dependency checking and other features that are sure to be popular with Gentoo Linux users everywhere. Additionally, this week's issue talks about changes to Perl to ease the translation from 5.6.1 to 5.8 and also discusses the new prelinking capabilities recently introduced to Gentoo Linux. Finally, this issue includes information on how you can help the Gentoo Linux project continue to grow.
